#Command and MP are held to a higher standard.
Command and MP are held to a higher standard of play. They are expected to be knowledgable on marine law and SOP.
## General Standards - You may be rolebanned without warning. - Be competent in your job and department. Failure to know the basics of your department is liable to result in a job ban. - Do not willingly and openly cooperate with terrorists/hostile forces. - Some leeway is given to making deals with hostile forces if the deal benefits the safety or situation of the ship as a whole and not just yourself. - You are expected to uphold the Law & maintain order. Do not engage in lawbreaking activity or troublemaker behavior. - Do not abandon your position to do things unrelated to your role. - Do not abandon the ship during a raid without a reasonable defense of no less than 30 minutes.
## Command specific - Command are at minimum expected to report criminal activity to MP.
## MP Specific - MP is expected to intervene into criminal activity where possible, unless it conflicts with marine law. - The MP are not combat roles, and should focus solely on enforcing laws.
